nodes.text: Draboon was a terrestrial astronomical object. Before the Invasion of Naboo and during his days as a Jedi Padawan, Obi-Wan Kenobi and his master, Qui-Gon Jinn were assigned to protect the Duchess of the New Mandalorians, Satine Kryze. At some point during their mission, they went to Draboon, where Kenobi had to defend the Duchess from a swarm of venom-mites. When Kenobi tried to carry Kryze to safety, he fell, resulting in the Duchess obtaining a scar.
